New Records: Australia's highest ever opening partnership at a World Cup
Key Match Events: Marcus Stoinis' wickets of Abdullah Shafique and Imam-ul-Huq
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins' comment on Adam Zampa's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's highest successful chase requirement in World Cup history
Others: The match took place in Bengaluru
Haris Rauf went for 3-83 from eight overs
